name: @blockswaplab/lsd-wizard
description: SDK for Liquid Staking Derivative Network

scripts.postinstall: typechain --target ethers-v5 --out-dir contracts/stakehouse './node_modules/@blockswaplab/stakehouse-protocol-abis/artifacts/*.json' && typechain --target ethers-v5 --out-dir contracts/lsd './node_modules/@blockswaplab/lsd-protocol-abis/artifacts/*.json'
